Package org.finra.herd.app.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApplicationUserBuilder
    A builder that knows how to build an application user.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HerdUserDetailsService  
    HttpHeaderApplicationUserBuilder
    Http headers based Application user builder.
    HttpHeaderAuthenticationFilter
    A Spring pre-authentication filter that works with Http headers.
    SecurityHelper
    A helper class for Security code.
    TrustedApplicationUserBuilder
    Application user builder that builds a trusted user with trusted role.
    TrustedUserAuthenticationFilter
    A Spring pre-authentication filter that builds a trusted user based on a SpEL expression environment variable.
